Package org.jgrapes.portlets.markdowndisplay

A portlet component for displaying markdown text in a portal.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MarkdownDisplayPortlet
    A portlet used to display information to the user.
    MarkdownDisplayPortlet.MarkdownDisplayModel
    The portlet’s model.
    MarkdownDisplayPortletFactory
    A factory for creating MarkdownDisplayPortlets.

Package org.jgrapes.portlets.markdowndisplay Description
